languages.text: "М? А ты позволишь это сделать? После всего, через что мы прошли? После того, каким... покорным я был, ты позволишь мне разгуливать без твоей печати?" {n}В глазах друкари вспыхивает ехидная злоба.{/n} "Значит ли это, что я ошибся в наших ролях? Что ж... посмотрим".

"Hmm? You would allow me to do that? After everything we have experienced? After how... submissive I have been, you would let me walk around without your brand?" {n}The Drukhari's eyes are taunting, flashing with malice.{/n} "Does that mean I have mistaken our roles? Well... we shall see."
languages.original_text: "М? А ты позволишь это сделать? После всего, через что мы прошли? После того, каким... покорным я был, ты позволишь мне разгуливать без твоей печати?" {n}В глазах друкари вспыхивает ехидная злоба.{/n} "Значит ли это, что я ошибся в наших ролях? Что ж... посмотрим".

traits.locale_text: "Hmm? You would allow me to do that? After everything we have experienced? After how... submissive I have been, you would let me walk around without your brand?" {n}The Drukhari's eyes are taunting, flashing with malice.{/n} "Does that mean I have mistaken our roles? Well... we shall see."

"Hmm? You would allow me to do that? After everything we have experienced? After how... submissive I have been, you would let me walk around without your brand?" {n}The Drukhari's eyes are taunting, flashing with malice.{/n} "Does that mean I have mistaken our roles? Well... we shall see."

"Hmm? You would allow me to do that? After everything we have experienced? After how... submissive I have been, you would let me walk around without your brand?" {n}The Drukhari's eyes are taunting, flashing with malice.{/n} "Does that mean I have mistaken our roles? Well... we shall see."

"Hmm? You would allow me to do that? After everything we have experienced? After how... submissive I have been, you would let me walk around without your brand?" {n}The Drukhari's eyes are taunting, flashing with malice.{/n} "Does that mean I have mistaken our roles? Well... we shall see."

languages.text: “嗯？我们明明一起经历过了这么多事情，你却还打算让我这么做吗？我一直对你如此……顺从，你真的打算允许我到处走动，身上却没有打着你烙下的烙印？”{n}玛拉斋露出了嘲弄的眼神，目光中充满了恶毒。{/n}“这是否意味着，是我搞错了我们之间的主仆身份？嗯……我们走着瞧吧。”
languages.original_text: "Hmm? You would allow me to do that? After everything we have experienced? After how... submissive I have been, you would let me walk around without your brand?" {n}The Drukhari's eyes are taunting, flashing with malice.{/n} "Does that mean I have mistaken our roles? Well... we shall see."

traits.locale_text: “嗯？我们明明一起经历过了这么多事情，你却还打算让我这么做吗？我一直对你如此……顺从，你真的打算允许我到处走动，身上却没有打着你烙下的烙印？”{n}玛拉斋露出了嘲弄的眼神，目光中充满了恶毒。{/n}“这是否意味着，是我搞错了我们之间的主仆身份？嗯……我们走着瞧吧。”

languages.text: 「ん？それでいいのか？あれだけのことを2人でして？あれほど俺は従順に尽くしたのに…お前の印もなく歩き回っていいと…？」{n}デュカーリの目は挑発するようにギラリと光る。{/n}「俺が自分の役割を見誤ったか？まぁ…どうなるか見てみよう」
languages.original_text: "Hmm? You would allow me to do that? After everything we have experienced? After how... submissive I have been, you would let me walk around without your brand?" {n}The Drukhari's eyes are taunting, flashing with malice.{/n} "Does that mean I have mistaken our roles? Well... we shall see."

traits.locale_text: 「ん？それでいいのか？あれだけのことを2人でして？あれほど俺は従順に尽くしたのに…お前の印もなく歩き回っていいと…？」{n}デュカーリの目は挑発するようにギラリと光る。{/n}「俺が自分の役割を見誤ったか？まぁ…どうなるか見てみよう」

languages.text: «¿Oh? ¿Me lo permitirías? ¿Después de todo lo que hemos experimentado? ¿Después de lo... sumiso que he sido, me dejarías ir por ahí sin tu marca?». {n}El drukhari te tienta con una mirada cargada de malicia.{/n} «¿Significa eso que he confundido nuestros respectivos papeles? Bien... ya lo veremos».
languages.original_text: "Hmm? You would allow me to do that? After everything we have experienced? After how... submissive I have been, you would let me walk around without your brand?" {n}The Drukhari's eyes are taunting, flashing with malice.{/n} "Does that mean I have mistaken our roles? Well... we shall see."

traits.locale_text: «¿Oh? ¿Me lo permitirías? ¿Después de todo lo que hemos experimentado? ¿Después de lo... sumiso que he sido, me dejarías ir por ahí sin tu marca?». {n}El drukhari te tienta con una mirada cargada de malicia.{/n} «¿Significa eso que he confundido nuestros respectivos papeles? Bien... ya lo veremos».

languages.text: « Hmm ? Vous me laisseriez faire ? Après tout ce que nous avons vécu ? Après... l'obéissance que je vous ai témoignée, vous me laisseriez circuler librement sans votre marque ? » {n}Empreint de malveillance, le regard du Drukhari se fait provocateur.{/n} « Est-ce à dire que j'ai confondu nos rôles respectifs ? Ma foi... c'est ce que nous allons voir. »
languages.original_text: "Hmm? You would allow me to do that? After everything we have experienced? After how... submissive I have been, you would let me walk around without your brand?" {n}The Drukhari's eyes are taunting, flashing with malice.{/n} "Does that mean I have mistaken our roles? Well... we shall see."

traits.locale_text: « Hmm ? Vous me laisseriez faire ? Après tout ce que nous avons vécu ? Après... l'obéissance que je vous ai témoignée, vous me laisseriez circuler librement sans votre marque ? » {n}Empreint de malveillance, le regard du Drukhari se fait provocateur.{/n} « Est-ce à dire que j'ai confondu nos rôles respectifs ? Ma foi... c'est ce que nous allons voir. »

languages.text: "Hmm? Ihr gestattet mir das? Nach allem, was wir erlebt haben? Trotz meiner ... Unterwürfigkeit würdet Ihr mich ohne Euer Brandmal herumlaufen lassen?" {n}Der Blick des Drukhari zeigt Spott, seine Augen funkeln böse.{/n} "Bedeutet das, dass ich etwa unsere Rollen verwechselt habe? Nun ... das wird sich zeigen."
languages.original_text: "Hmm? You would allow me to do that? After everything we have experienced? After how... submissive I have been, you would let me walk around without your brand?" {n}The Drukhari's eyes are taunting, flashing with malice.{/n} "Does that mean I have mistaken our roles? Well... we shall see."

traits.locale_text: "Hmm? Ihr gestattet mir das? Nach allem, was wir erlebt haben? Trotz meiner ... Unterwürfigkeit würdet Ihr mich ohne Euer Brandmal herumlaufen lassen?" {n}Der Blick des Drukhari zeigt Spott, seine Augen funkeln böse.{/n} "Bedeutet das, dass ich etwa unsere Rollen verwechselt habe? Nun ... das wird sich zeigen."

languages.text: "Ha? Kazımama izin verir miydin? Deneyimlediğin onca şeyden sonra hem de? O kadar... İtaatkâr olduktan sonra senin damgan olmadan etrafta dolaşmama izin verir miydin?" {n}Drukhari'nin alaycı gözleri, şerle parıldıyor.{/n} "Bu, rollerimizi karıştırdığım manasına mı geliyor? Peki o hâlde... Göreceğiz."
languages.original_text: "Hmm? You would allow me to do that? After everything we have experienced? After how... submissive I have been, you would let me walk around without your brand?" {n}The Drukhari's eyes are taunting, flashing with malice.{/n} "Does that mean I have mistaken our roles? Well... we shall see."
